SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Interface ServerRemote

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Stub
public interface ServerRemote extends Remote
The ServerRemote interface defines remote methods that a server can expose to clients for communication in a distributed system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    heartbeat(String uuid)
    Sends a heartbeat signal to keep a client's connection alive.
    void
    receive(String uuid, Message m)
    Receives a message from a client identified by UUID.
    String
    setCallback(ClientRemote callback)
    Sets the callback interface for a client identified by UUID.

  • Method Details

    • receive

      void receive(String uuid, Message m) throws RemoteException
      Receives a message from a client identified by UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the unique identifier of the client
      m - the Message object received from the client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a communication-related exception during the remote method call

    • setCallback

      String setCallback(ClientRemote callback) throws RemoteException
      Sets the callback interface for a client identified by UUID.
      Parameters:
      callback - the ClientRemote object representing the callback interface for the client
      Returns:
      the UUID assigned to the client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a communication-related exception during the remote method call

    • heartbeat

      void heartbeat(String uuid) throws RemoteException
      Sends a heartbeat signal to keep a client's connection alive.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the unique identifier of the client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a communication-related exception during the remote method call
